snippet: Government prosecutors said that United States Attorney Carmen Ortiz would recommend to Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. this week whether the marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev should face the death penalty.
abstract: Government prosecutors say United States Attorney Carmen Ortiz is poised to recommend to Atty Gen Eric H Holder Jr whether Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev should face death penalty.
lead_paragraph: Government prosecutors said that United States Attorney Carmen Ortiz would recommend to Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. this week whether the marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev should face the death penalty.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Hearing in Marathon Bombing Case
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Hearing In Marathon Bombing Case
